title: The Hibbert Journal
additional-note: This is a British publication. Its contents may still be copyrighted even without renewals or copyright notices, if they meet GATT copyright restoration requirements for works first published outside the US. Volume 22 (1923-1924) was published with both US and UK locations on the volume title page.  We have not examined later volumes.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Erica Lu for copyright research on this title.
